traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
traits.desc: The monodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.desc: If the monodrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6) piercing damage.
